Darkfate/Blacknighmare::

"One of our Allies, Scorponok" said Darkfate. He used his comm link 
and spoke to Blacknighmare "Blacknightmare, I like a complete report 
of Predacon's council damage..." and looking to Drillbit "We have to 
search and keep everthing that result undamaged by explotion.."

"How do you feel, Scorponok?" asked Darkfate to Scorponok.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> >::DrillBit::
> >
> >He saw Darkfate and the troops arrive. He nodded.
> >"We are still waiting for Killfest, his troops, and a few others."
> 
> Scorponok, hoped off of Darkfate's back. His computer system 
informed him
> he has almost totally recovered. He felt a little less nervous now, 
but was
> still clicking his claws togethers. "Who, Who's he Sir?" He asked 
pointing
> towards Drillbit.
